Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of L4FW. This also contains some related macros.

Function Documentation

int32_t L4FWClrAllErrors ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  portNum 
)

This function Clears Error status for an IA port.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of L4 Firewall instance.
portNumInitiator port number of the Firewall
Returns
STW_SOK on success
void L4FWGetErrorLog ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  portNum,
L4FWErrStat_t *  errStat 
)

This function gets Error information for an IA port.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of L4 Firewall instance.
portNumInitiator port number of the Firewall
errStatThis is a pointer to structure to fill the error status corresponding to the IA port
Returns
none
uint32_t L4FWGetProtGroupMembers ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  groupNum 
)

This function gets connId values for a protection group.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of L4 Firewall instance.
groupNumProtection group Number
Returns
Bitfields corresponding to connId values that have the firewall firewall access for the group
